mapper.select: select round(SUM(tr.score)/count(cbno), 1) from tbl_class_curriculum tcc, tbl_review tr where tcc.ccno = tr.ccno and cbno = #{cbno}

select reno, content, (select nick from tbl_member tm where tm.id = tr.writer) writer, score, tr.regdate, updatedate, ccno from tbl_class_curriculum join tbl_review tr using(ccno) where cbno = #{cbno.cbno} order by reno desc
select count(*) from tbl_review join tbl_class_curriculum tcc using(ccno) where cbno = #{cbno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(content, writer, score, ccno) values (#{content}, #{writer}, #{score}, #{ccno})
mapper.update: update tbl_review set content = #{content}, score = #{score}, updatedate = now() where reno = #{reno}
